Name: Clear-UevAppxPackage
Synopsis: Clears a setting in the computer or user sections of the registry.

Name: Clear-UevConfiguration
Synopsis: Clears UE-V configuration settings.

Name: Disable-Uev
Synopsis: Disables the UE-V service.

Name: Disable-UevAppxPackage
Synopsis: Disables UE-V synchronization of Windows 8 apps.

Name: Disable-UevTemplate
Synopsis: Disables a settings location template.

Name: Enable-Uev
Synopsis: Enables the UE-V service.

Name: Enable-UevAppxPackage
Synopsis: Enables UE-V synchronization of Windows 8 apps.

Name: Enable-UevTemplate
Synopsis: Enables a settings location template.

Name: Export-UevConfiguration
Synopsis: Exports the UE-V configuration.

Name: Export-UevPackage
Synopsis: Exports the settings stored in a settings package.

Name: Get-UevAppxPackage
Synopsis: Gets a list of Windows 8 apps and synchronization status.

Name: Get-UevConfiguration
Synopsis: Gets the UE-V configuration settings.

Name: Get-UevStatus
Synopsis: Gets the status of the UE-V service.

Name: Get-UevTemplate
Synopsis: Gets settings location templates for UE-V.

Name: Get-UevTemplateProgram
Synopsis: Gets the information about programs defined by a settings location template.

Name: Import-UevConfiguration
Synopsis: Imports the UE-V configuration.

Name: Register-UevTemplate
Synopsis: Registers a settings location template with UE-V.

Name: Repair-UevTemplateIndex
Synopsis: Repairs a corrupted UE-V template index.

Name: Restore-UevBackup
Synopsis: Applies backed up settings from another computer to this computer.

Name: Restore-UevUserSetting
Synopsis: Sets a restore flag for the user settings.

Name: Set-UevConfiguration
Synopsis: Modifies UE-V configuration settings.

Name: Set-UevTemplateProfile
Synopsis: Modifies which profile to associate with an individual template.

Name: Test-UevTemplate
Synopsis: Verifies whether a template complies with the schema for UE-V.

Name: Unregister-UevTemplate
Synopsis: Unregisters a settings location template from Microsoft User Experience Virtualization (UE-V).

Name: Update-UevTemplate
Synopsis: Updates settings location templates in UE-V.
